Kicker {1}{B} and/or {1}{G} [i](You may pay an additional {1}{B} and/or {1}{G} as you cast this spell.)[/i]
If Negavolver was kicked with its {1}{B} kicker, it enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.
If Negavolver was kicked with its {1}{G} kicker, when it enters the battlefield, it deals damage equal to its power divided as you choose among one or two target creatures.
